name: Lost Boy (201 Games)
description:
Out of curiosity, a boy found himself lost inside a portal. Time just moves so fast when we are lost into something. Now it's already fall, help this lost boy find his way back home by collecting essential items to reset the portal. 

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - basic up, down, left and right movements
  • F - pick up/enter portal

CREDITS TO:

  • analogStudios_
  • Landon - RPG Soundtrack Pack
